name: FortCollinsTrailBuddy
0:
”Alexa ask Trail Buddy for trail status”
”Alexa ask Trail Buddy about the trails”
”Alexa ask Trail Buddy what trails are open”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trail buddy
des: This skill uses data provided by the city of Fort Collins and Larimer County to provide information on which natural areas are open to biking and hiking. The information is updated every morning.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
